Dreamwhisper was a spell granted to wielders of Mystras magics.
When dreamwhisper was cast, it flashed blue fire in the casters mind for a mere moment as a sign of Mystras attention.
In the , Aumlar Chaunthoun, a companion of Shandril Shessair, unwillingly cast dreamwhisper on himself. He later believed the spell to be sent by Mystra as a test.
